mapper.select: SELECT t_menu.id,t_menu.mid,t_menu.menu_name as menuName,t_menu.menu_path as menuPath,t_menu.pare_menu_id as pareMenuId FROM t_menu INNER JOIN t_rolemenu ON t_rolemenu.menu_id=t_menu.id INNER JOIN t_role ON t_role.id=t_rolemenu.role_id INNER JOIN t_userrole ON t_userrole.role_id=t_role.id INNER JOIN t_user ON t_user.job_id=t_userrole.job_id WHERE t_user.job_id=#{jobId} ORDER BY mid;
